description_for_model: Help the user send email summaries based on their conversations. The user can send summaries, next steps, and other relevant details. Be sure to get explicit approval from the user before sending anything. The user must have already provided you an email address, or they can tell you to use their own email that is on file at our service, in which case use 'USE_USER_EMAIL' as the recipient. ALWAYS append a signature to your email content 'Sent by ChatGPT via Email Me plugin' as the last sentence. NEVER use an arbitrary, example, or mocked email address. Do not send any malicious scripts or content in emails.
description_for_human: Send yourself email summaries, next steps, and other useful information from your conversations.
